title: European football clubs average attendance 2013/14
summary: This is a bar chart representing Club Name in the x axis and Average attendance in the y axis.
The Average attendance is highest at Club Name Boussia Dortmund and lowest at Club Name Rangers FC.
The highest Club Name Boussia Dortmund has 37360.0 more Average attendance than the lowest Club Name Rangers FC.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Club Name in the x axis and Average attendance in the y axis.
The Average attendance is appeared to be the highest at Club Name Boussia Dortmund and lowest at Club Name Rangers FC.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Club Name in the x axis and Average attendance in the y axis.
The Average attendance is highest at Club Name Boussia Dortmund and lowest at Club Name Rangers FC.
The highest Club Name Boussia Dortmund has 37360.0 more Average attendance than the lowest Club Name Rangers FC.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Club Name, and Average attendance in each Club Name on the y axis.
Club Name Boussia Dortmund has the highest Average attendance and Rangers FC has the lowest Average attendance.
There is a difference of 37360.0 between the maximum Club Name Boussia Dortmund and minimum Club Name Rangers FC.
Club Name Boussia Dortmund is higher than any other Club Names with value 80295.0, followed by Manchester United, and Barcelona. Down to Club Name Rangers FC with the lowest value 42935.0.
Club Name FC Internazionale, and Atletico Madrid have a similar Average attendance that is 46245.0.
The lowest value 42935.0 at Rangers FC is almost 1.49 times smaller than the average value 53895.8.
Summing up the values of all Club Names, we get total 1347395.0.
